packages.name: nvim
packages.description: Neovim is an extensible, modern Vim with enhanced performance, plugin support, and built-in terminal.

packages.name: chatgpt-shell-cli
packages.description: A minimal shell script for accessing OpenAI’s ChatGPT and DALL·E directly from the terminal
packages.exec: dnf copr enable kylegospo/chatGPT-shell-cli -y && dnf install chatgpt-shell-cli -y
